short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import products from ebay, aliexpress & amazon to https://ethshop.tk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for app https://ethshop.tk/
  Features:
  - Add products to your 'import list' directly from the ebay, amazon & aliexpress product page
  - Place orders on ebay, amazon & aliexpress with an automatically filled in checkout form
  - Import order details to kappoto in bulk from the ebay, amazon & aliexpress order page
